name: WebGL2RenderingContext.bindBufferRange
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.bindBufferRange() method of the WebGL 2 API binds a range of a given WebGLBuffer to a given binding point (target) at a given index.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'bindBufferRange' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 3.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glBindBufferRange' in the 'OpenGL ES 3.0' specification.
